title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1502.6 - Records for new and existing systems
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1502.6 - Records for new and existing systems

State Regulations
(a) All chart and tape records of watchmen shall be kept on file for at least six
months and shall be available to the department's authorized
inspector. (b) Extra charts and
tapes for recording clocks shall be inaccessible to the watchman. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1502.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
